DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate PD 0332334 affect pharmacokinetics lithium co-administering drug healthy adult .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study To Estimate The Effects Of PD 0332334 On Lithium Pharmacokinetics In Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Additional Study Purpose Details : To investigate potential drug-drug interaction PD 0332334 lithium
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female Age 21 55 ( inclusive ) BMI range 18 30 kg/m2 Previous participation PD 332334 study Pregnant nursing female Hypersensitivity ( allergic ) lithium , Neurontin ( gabapentin ) , Lyrica ( pregabalin )
